content: @Michel Rutten HL7 France has built a profile "fr-organization" based on Organization, adding 3 extensions to the base resource, and then a profile "fr-organization-pole" based on "fr-organization", adding one more extension. The 4 extensions are visible in the latter in Forge, and also appear in the detailed view of simplifier. The issue is that the overview of "fr-organization-pole" in simplifier shows only the last extension. It looks like an issue on showing a differential based on another differential in simplifier. Both profiles are in HL7 France project on simplifier. Any explanation? Thanks.
@François Macary , this is likely an issue in Simplifier. we are looking into it.

@Richard Townley-O'Neill Thanks for the link to the discussion on the interpretation of mustSupport and of layered profiles.
@Martijn Harthoorn Thank you also for looking into the current issue in Simplifier.
We've identified the issue to be our rendering engine. It will takes us a bit of time to fix it. We will probably deploy a fix somewhere next week.
@François Macary , the issue is fixed. All your extensions are visible again.
